home.subTitle: Your Blockchain-based Resume for One-click Verify.
home.mobileSubTitle: Your Blockchain-based Resume for One-click Verify.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.quote: “We are the sum total of our experiences.”
aboutUs.descriptionP1: You may have the habit of keeping a diary, taking down your daily exquisite dribs and drabs by pencils and paper. Nevertheless, things don’t turn out the way we wish as our stories are forgotten easily, and the world thus forgets us.
aboutUs.descriptionP2: Still, we firmly believe our every footstep counts - since all are worth recording. This is why Turing Certs has been dedicating to setting up a career portfolio from your 1st-grade to your graduation, even from your 1st occupation through your ultimate success. Seeking authenticity by e-signature, protecting our Mother Nature by going paperless, and guarding your personal data by digital identification are our missions.
aboutUs.descriptionP3: The 1st-quarter of the 21st-century is coming to an end, and Turing Certs still centers around every individual. Connecting every piece of virtual and real-world you together, we outline and shape people in detail by what they have gone through.
aboutUs.descriptionP4: “You are also the sum total of your experiences.” Turing Certs will be your best e-experience.

subdescriptions.0: Adopted incorruptible, secure, and trustworthy blockchain technology to ensure 100% authenticity for every certificate.
subdescriptions.1: HR departments can verify authenticity anytime at anywhere via links shared by students to make personnel screening more convenient and time saving.
subdescriptions.2: Let students' learning portfolio be saved properly, and omit the incovenience for doing paper work, additionally, reduce the human cost for preserving data.

comparison.title: Turing Certs

comparison.description3: Induced 3,000 students to own an international anti-counterfeiting digital learning portfolio

subdescription.1: Import Background Image and Information Filed

demo.title: The New Era of Resumes!
demo.description:
All certificates in one device.
 From academic transcript, competency certification, online courses, competition & awards, to all achievements records are being covered.
 TuringCerts improves the user experiences for certificate keeping, and promises the characteristics of anti-counterfeit, source traceability, and minimal learning curves.
